text: @KHOU @GovAbbott you need to close beaches for 2 weeks! Yes, especially with 4th of July next weekend. The Beach is where #COVID19 is spreading like wildfire & you know it. Go to the beach have fun, bring home a souvenir #COVID19 @LinaHidalgoTX @ABC @NBCNews @CBSNews @KPRC2 @DrJAshton
